entry.title: marshmallow-select: alpha junkware to crash your servers
entry.summary:
This is to announce the publication of my package marshmallow-select, formerly part of the Distribute corporate repo, but since moved to marshmallow-code.

As the sqlalchemy docs cogently point out, the biggest problem people usually have with ORM...

entry.title: A Codeblogger's Apology
entry.summary:
After working in the industry for years and reading lots of programming blogs, I finally decided to start my own. A decent respect for the opinions of mankind demands I say why. Also, I wanted to start with more than 1 post.

For one thing, I finally...
